Description:
Adversaries may abuse container files such as disk image (.iso, .vhd) file formats to deliver malicious payloads that may not be tagged with MOTW.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Suspicious Mount-DiskImage
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%mount-diskimage %' and scriptblocktext like '%-imagepath %')
